title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When intermixing tabs and spaces, the ShiftLeft behavior may not align the text as expected.
EB: Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that both lines are indented the same visually. After executing ShiftLeft, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left, at least up to the space character (i.e., removing the tab character). It is currently confusing as there might be unexpected behavior if there is a stray space preventing the text from shifting.
SR: Ensure that ShiftLeft properly aligns the text when there are intermixed tabs and spaces, removing any stray spaces and aligning the text correctly as per the given constraints.
